level.heading: Use of less than fully automatic equipment using fuel oil and use of any fuel burning equipment using residual fuel oil; supervision by licensed person.
level.text: ยง 24-159 Use of less than fully automatic equipment using fuel oil and use of any fuel burning equipment using residual fuel oil; supervision by licensed person. No person shall cause or permit the use of fuel burning equipment which uses fuel oil and is less than fully automatic, or the use of fuel burning equipment, whether fully automatic or not, which uses residual fuel oil, except under the direct supervision of a person having a certificate of fitness as required by section 27-4014 of the code.
